00004 #define LED1 6
00005 #define LED2 7

00014 RESSOURCE_LIST_LOAD(ressources_list);

00016 // Declaration of the ressource
00017 RESSOURCE_INIT(led0);
00018 RESSOURCE_INIT(PwmLed0);
00019 
00020 void setLed0(int val){
00021   if(val) HARDWARE_DIGIT_SET_UP(PORTB, LED0);
00022   else    HARDWARE_DIGIT_SET_DOWN(PORTB,LED0);
00023 }
00024 
00025 int getLed0(){
00026   return (HARDWARE_DIGIT_GET(PORTB, LED0) != 0);
00027 }
00028 
00029 void setPwmLed0(int val){
00030   HARDWARE_PWM_SET(PWM1,val);
00031 }
00032 
00033 int getPwmLed0(){
00034   HARDWARE_PWM_GET(PWM1);
00035 }
00036 
00037 RESSOURCES_INIT(){
00038   HARDWARE_PWM_INIT();
00039 }
00040 
00041 // Connection between the driver API and the REST API
00042 RESSOURCES_LOADER(){
00043 
00044         RESSOURCE_UNIT(led0,boolean);
00045         RESSOURCE_GET(led0,&getLed0);
00046         RESSOURCE_SET(led0,&setLed0);
00047 
00048         RESSOURCE_UNIT(PwmLed0,%);
00049         RESSOURCE_SET(PwmLed0,&setPwmLed0);
00050         RESSOURCE_GET(PwmLed0,&getPwmLed0);
00051 }
